## Source: ossf-package-analysis (ea65d71551b4d01fb99a1bfe5236b0d5c80c0b566ae60d044b71857883f17b21)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@taxify/trippricing' @ 9.999.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
